articles.content:
Emergency Relief Materials from Russia 
    Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The first installment of the free relief materials donated by the Russian government including medicines, tents, blankets, etc. worth 13,600,000 Rbl arrived in Pyongyang by air on April 27 after the explosion in Ryongchon Railway Station, North Phyongan Province.
 At the airport Valery Shuikov, director of the Bureau of International Cooperation of the Ministry of Civil Defence, Extraordinary Situation and Elimination of Aftermaths of Natural Calamities, handed them to Ri Yong Sok, vice-chairman of the DPRK Flood Damage Rehabilitation Committee.    
 Present at the airport were Andrei Karlov, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Tanzania
Kim Yong Nam Greets Togolese President
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Tanzania 
    Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Benjamin William Mkapa, president of Tanzania, on April 24 on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the United Republic of Tanzania.
 Kim Yong Nam in his message said that the Tanzanian people have made great successes in their work to consolidate the independence of the country, achieve national unity and build prosperous Tanzania over the last 40 years.    
 Expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished him greater success in his work for the development and progress of the country.

articles.title: Kim Il Chol Meets New Vietnamese Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Togolese President
    Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Gnassingbe Eyadema, president of Togo, on April 26 on the occasion of the 44th anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing the belief that the ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop in the interests of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished him a great success in his work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun Meets Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Il Chol Meets New Vietnamese Ambassador
    Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, met and had a friendly talk with Phan Trong Thai, new Vietnamese ambassador e. p. to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him today.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Czech Delegation
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Meets Russian Delegation
    Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs headed by Department Director Ye. V. Afanasiyev today.
 Present were officials concerned, the Russian ambassador to the DPRK and embassy officials.

Choe Thae Bok Meets Czech Delegation
    Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly Choe Thae Bok met and had a friendly talk with a delegation of the Czech Ministry of Foreign Affairs headed by Deputy Minister Petr Kolar who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
